## statement variable

Joi schema to validate each log statement against.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
statement: Joi.ObjectSchema<Statement>
```

## Remarks

Log statements are validated only when the option `should_validate_log_statements` is set to `true`<!-- -->.
